description: {"blocks":[{"key":"171g5","text":"This is the protocol for immune profiling using 16-color panel for PD patient PBMCs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

funders.funder_name: Aligning Science Across Parkinson’s (ASAP) Collaborative Research Network

materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"9b1lp","text":"Materials: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bapli","text":"1.\t1x PBS ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4lct1","text":"2.\tFlow cytometry staining buffer (Stain Buffer) – 1x PBS + 2% FBS, filtered with 0.2um filter ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d3nml","text":"3.\tBrilliant buffer plus ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"88nlc","text":"4.\tStaining Kit: eBioscience™ Foxp3 / Transcription Factor Staining Buffer Set (00-5523-00) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"79d6","text":"5.\tPBMC isolated from buffy coat for no stain control and Ghost dye only control ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7tplb","text":"6.\t15ml tubes, frozen vials, V-bottom 96-well plates, FACS tubes with cell strainer snap cap","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"10ac3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9brjl","text":"Samples: PD patient PBMCs; 1M cells per sample","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.section: Day 1 (the day before staining) for 16 colors staining:
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9lqt7","text":"1. Label 1.5ml tubes with Compo-beads control IDs","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 1 (the day before staining) for 16 colors staining:
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"egb79","text":"2. Add 1 drop of Compo-bead into corresponding tube (1 drop for each tube, totally 15 drops)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 1 (the day before staining) for 16 colors staining:

steps.section: Day 1 (the day before staining) for 16 colors staining:
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"comaj","text":"4. Vortex well, and incubate at 4°C for 30 min, avoid light","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 1 (the day before staining) for 16 colors staining:
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"drojh","text":"5. Wash with 1 mL Stain Buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 1 (the day before staining) for 16 colors staining:
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8sqmm","text":"6. Spin at 1500 rpm for 5 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 1 (the day before staining) for 16 colors staining:
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"75tq9","text":"7. Dump the supernatant, and directly tap on kim-wiper once gently","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"20prk","text":"8. Resuspend into 500 µl Stain Buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 1 (the day before staining) for 16 colors staining:

steps.section: Day 1 (the day before staining) for 16 colors staining:
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7ktmr","text":"4. Wash with 1 mL Stain Buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4ebmk","text":"5. Spin at 1500 rpm for 5 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"78bjo","text":"6. Dump the supernatant, and directly tap on kim-wiper once gently","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4ceeg","text":"Prepare the Fc blocker: 1:100 dilution with stain buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 1 (the day before staining) for 16 colors staining:
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7qbtu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"rmhj","text":"     Antibody      Volume/ Sample (µl)      *N      For each sample        CD16/CD32      1             100 µl        Stain buffer      99          ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":148}],"data":{}},{"key":"ei5rp","text":"\nVortex well and store at 4oC ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":27,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1eobe","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b0cmm","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","0_3":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","1_3":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":""},"colTitles":[],"colWidths":[98,119,38,103],"data":[["  \u003cb\u003eAntibody\u003c/b\u003e\u003cb\u003e\u003c/b\u003e  ","  \u003cb\u003eVolume/ Sample (µl)\u003c/b\u003e\u003cb\u003e\u003c/b\u003e  ","  \u003cb\u003e*N\u003c/b\u003e\u003cb\u003e\u003c/b\u003e  ","  \u003cb\u003eFor each sample\u003c/b\u003e\u003cb\u003e\u003c/b\u003e  "],["  CD16/CD32  ","  1  ","     ","  100 µl  "],["  Stain buffer  ","  99  ","     ",null]],"guid":"474E9D503C8711EEB162013F89B09BE0","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":[],"printData":[["  \u003cb\u003eAntibody\u003c/b\u003e\u003cb\u003e\u003c/b\u003e  ","  \u003cb\u003eVolume/ Sample (µl)\u003c/b\u003e\u003cb\u003e\u003c/b\u003e  ","  \u003cb\u003e*N\u003c/b\u003e\u003cb\u003e\u003c/b\u003e  ","  \u003cb\u003eFor each sample\u003c/b\u003e\u003cb\u003e\u003c/b\u003e  "],["  CD16/CD32  ","  1  ","     ","  100 µl  "],["  Stain buffer  ","  99  ","     ",null]],"rowHeights":[]}}}}

steps.section: Day 1 (the day before staining) for 16 colors staining:
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fvbts","text":"Ghost dye master tube: 0.5ul Ghost dye + 100ul PBS for each sample","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 1 (the day before staining) for 16 colors staining:
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6vs8s","text":"1. Remove Ghost Dye vial from freezer and allow to equilibrate to room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 1 (the day before staining) for 16 colors staining:
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6b6mh","text":"2. Quick spin Ghost Dye vial before opening.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 1 (the day before staining) for 16 colors staining:
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"16g1t","text":"3. Make Ghost Dye staining solution, and vortex well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"btj4u","text":"- Note: Ghost Dyes are formulated in DMSO, pipet carefully and slowly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5bnut","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"56apu","text":" Volume/ Sample (µl) *N For each sample Ghost dye Volume/ Sample (µl) 0.5 100 µl PBS 100 ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":152}],"data":{}},{"key":"a36ss","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","0_3":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","1_3":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":""},"colTitles":[],"colWidths":[98,119,38,103],"data":[[""," Volume/ Sample (µl) "," *N "," For each sample "],[" Ghost dye Volume/ Sample (µl) "," 0.5 "," "," 100 µl "],[" PBS "," 100 "," ",null]],"guid":"7A0AE5503C8711EEB162013F89B09BE0","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":[],"printData":[[""," Volume/ Sample (µl) "," *N "," For each sample "],[" Ghost dye Volume/ Sample (µl) "," 0.5 "," "," 100 µl "],[" PBS "," 100 "," ",null]],"rowHeights":[]}}}}

steps.section: Day 1 (the day before staining) for 16 colors staining:
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5ei1g","text":"FoxP3 Fix/Perm buffer: 1:4 dilution; 100ul for each sample; prepare it on day 2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 1 (the day before staining) for 16 colors staining:
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"85r5u","text":"FoxP3 wash buffer: 1:10 dilution by water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 1 (the day before staining) for 16 colors staining:
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9drf1","text":"Prepare 15ml columns, FACS tubes with cell strainer snap cap and 78 frozen vials; label them accordingly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fh2l4","text":"Control cells:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9v8l","text":"1. Add 9ml RPMI medium into each 15mL tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5vofb","text":"2. Thaw one vial of PBMCs from -80°C at 37°C until it has a small piece of ice at a time. Add PBMCs into the 15mL tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4st1l","text":"3. Count cell numbers, and record the volume, viability and concentration.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"49m0g","text":"4. Spin down PBMCs for 5min at 1500rpm, resuspend in RPMI medium to get the final concentration of 10x106/ml.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":99,"length":10},{"style":"sup","offset":104,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3pdvu","text":"5. Add 100ul PBMCs into the V-bottom plates; Will need two wells, one is for no stain control (A), and one for Ghost dye only control (B)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":77,"length":20},{"style":"bold","offset":111,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1a63c","text":"PBMC Samples:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"rbuf","text":"1. Take all the PBMCs from LN2 to -80°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1ml7p","text":"2. Add 9ml RPMI medium into each 15mL tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bs26c","text":"3. Thaw maximum 5 vials of PBMCs from -80°C at 37°C until it has a small piece of ice at a time. Add PBMCs into the 15mL tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dg9kr","text":"4. Count cell numbers, and record the volume, viability and concentration.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5o0jv","text":"5. Spin down PBMCs for 5min at 1500rpm, resuspend in RPMI medium to get the final concentration of 10x106/ml.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cgj60","text":"6. Add 100ul PBMCs into the V-bottom plates; freeze the rest cells back using Mr. Frosty™ Freezing Container for future use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ad7nq","text":"7. Spin down PBMCs in V-bottom 96-well plate (26 samples for each group), discard the supernatant, add 200ul Stain buffer into the each well to wash the cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1kmc0","text":"8. Spin down PBMCs for 5min at 1500rpm, discard the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4t98v","text":"Ghost dye staining: Include Ghost dye only control","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bbbm3","text":"9. Add 100 µl of the Ghost Dye staining solution into cells (Include Ghost dye only control).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":61,"length":30}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"brde7","text":"10.  Incubate cells for 30 minutes at 4°C protected from light.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"frngq","text":"11.  Wash cells with 100ul Stain buffer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bb7g8","text":"12.  Spin down at 1500 rpm for 5 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8bc43","text":"13.  Aspirate the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fmfmp","text":"The samples are ready for Fc blocking except Ghost dye only control. For Ghost dye only control, store cells at 4oC for future permeabilization.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":45,"length":22},{"style":"bold","offset":73,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ep9sr","text":"FC Blocking: For PD patient PBMC samples","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"41f19","text":"14.  Add 100uL of FC blocker into cells ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8cidm","text":"15.  Incubate cells at RT for 10 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6pp9v","text":"16.  Wash the samples with 100ul Stain buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8muli","text":"17.  Spin down at 1500 rpm for 5 min (with Eppendorf tube centrifuge)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9pivl","text":"18.  Aspirate the supernatant (the pellets are ready for surface staining)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9eu1t","text":"Surface staining: For PD patient PBMC samples","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bn47o","text":"19.  Add 64 µl of surface staining cocktail from yesterday into samples, and mix them well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e8bmp","text":"20.  Incubate at 4oC for 30 min, protected from the light","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":18,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fh5sq","text":"21.  Wash with 100ul Stain Buffer, spin down at 1500 rpm for 5 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"evtpl","text":"22.  Aspirate the supernatant (the pellets are ready for the cell permeabilization)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"18c7b","text":"Cell Permeabilization: Include no stain control and Ghost dye only control","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bh736","text":"23.  Prepare Foxp3 perm buffer (1:4 dilution)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8s6hm","text":"24.  Add 100uL of Foxp3 perm buffer into each tube, and mix them well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"66imt","text":"25.  Incubate cells at RT for 60 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"apja2","text":"26.  Wash with 100ul Foxp3 wash buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e1r7t","text":"27.  Spin down at 1500 rpm for 5 min ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a09ve","text":"28.  Aspirate the supernatant (the pellets are ready for the intracellular staining).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cte6o","text":"Intracellular staining:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"61bq","text":"29.  Add 50 µl of the intracellular antibody cocktails from yesterday, and mix them well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a77n4","text":"30.  Incubate at 4 oC for 30 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":18,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1ljhv","text":"31.  Wash with 100ul Foxp3 wash Buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a80ts","text":"32.  Spin down at 1500 rpm for 5 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fpbt7","text":"33.  Aspirate the supernatant","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"82vck","text":"34.  Resuspend the pellets into 200ul stain Buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"21v9o","text":"35.  Vortex, and store at 4oC","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":27,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
